original: Balanced Budget
translation: 平衡预算

original: We must make the best with the resources at our disposal. A well-planned and balanced budget is key to our government's success.
translation: 我们必须充分利用我们所掌握的资源。精心策划和平衡预算是我们政府取得成功的关键。

original: Strengthen the Monarchists
translation: 激励君主主义者

original: The first step in returning Hungary to its previous prestige is to strengthen those parties that clamor for a return to a monarchy.
translation: 恢复匈牙利昔日声望的第一步是激励那些要求回归君主制的政党。

original: Elect a King
translation: 选举君主

original: Popular support for the nation to return to a monarchy government form is now sufficient that we can begin to think about initiating the process of electing a new King.
translation: 民众对国家恢复君主政体的支持度已经足够了，我们可以开始考虑启动选举新国王的进程。

original: Invite the Habsburg Prince
translation: 邀请哈布斯堡王子

original: Long have the Habsburgs ruled Hungary, and under their rule the country was a part of one of Europe's greatest empires. Returning a Habsburg to the helm will surely lead Hungary to greatness once more.
translation: 长期以来，哈布斯堡家族统治着匈牙利，在他们的统治下，这个国家是欧洲最伟大的帝国之一。回归哈布斯堡王朝，必将使匈牙利再次成为伟大的国家。

original: Demand a Referendum
translation: 要求全民公投

original: The dissolution of Austria-Hungary was a mistake. Austria and Hungary are stronger together, and a combination of both is required for either to achieve greatness. The Austrians must be made to hold a referendum on a proposal for the peaceful joining of our two nations.
translation: 奥匈帝国的解体是一个错误。奥地利与匈牙利联合将更强大，两者的结合是实现伟大的必要条件。奥地利必须就和平加入我们两国联合体的提议进行公投，

original: Take Austria By Force
translation: 武力占领奥地利

original: The first step in returning glory to Hungary is to re-integrate the Austrian lands. We cannot risk a failure in achieving this diplomatically, so we must do so through force.
translation: 恢复匈牙利荣耀的第一步是重新整合奥地利的土地。我们不能冒着外交失败的风险，因此我们必须通过武力来实现这一点。

original: Restoration of Austria-Hungary
translation: 奥匈帝国回归

original: With the reunification of our two nations and a Habsburg on the throne, we can now solemnly proclaim the restoration of Austria-Hungary, and see to retaking our rightful historical provinces!
translation: 随着我们两国的统一及王位归于哈布斯堡，我们现在可以郑重宣告奥匈帝国的回归，并重新夺回我们历史上合法的省份！

original: Protect Czechoslovakia
translation: 保护捷克斯洛伐克

original: Czechoslovakia has, since its independence, grown powerful and industrious, but their lands are eyed greedily by their neighbors. We will offer them our protection against these threats, either by welcoming them once again as an integral part of our Empire, or by granting them association status.
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克自独立以来，变得强大而勤劳，但他们的邻国贪婪地注视着其领土。我们将向他们提供保护，以应对这些威胁，无论是再次欢迎他们成为我们帝国的一部分，还是给予他们相关联地位。

original: Claim Transylvania
translation: 声索特兰西瓦尼亚

original: The area of Siebenbürgen was unfairly taken from us after the last war. It is time to reclaim it.
translation: 上一场战争后，特兰西瓦尼亚地区被不公正地从我们身上夺走。现在是收回它的时候了。

original: March to the Shore
translation: 向海岸进军

original: A true Great Power requires access to the seas. The coast of the Adriatic is our birthright.
translation: 真正的大国需要进入海洋。亚得里亚海的海岸是我们与生俱来的权利。

original: Reclaim Venetia
translation: 收复威尼斯

original: The treachery of the Italians in the Great War has not been forgotten. It is time to put them in their place, and restore the Empire to its natural borders.
translation: 一战中意大利人的背叛并没有被遗忘。现在是时候摆正他们的位置，并恢复帝国的天然边界了。

original: Claim Galicia
translation: 声索加利西亚

original: The state of Poland is nothing but an artificial construct. It can be created and dismantled as necessary.
translation: 波兰国只不过是一个人工建筑物，可以根据需要进行建造和拆除。

original: Claim the Bucovina
translation: 声索布科维纳

original: It may not be the most economically important of our wide-spread holdings, but it is still a part of our Empire. And we will reclaim it.
translation: 它可能不是我们广泛持有的最重要的经济利益，但它仍然是我们帝国的一部分。我们会收回它。

original: Reclaim the Empire
translation: 攫取皇冠

original: To finalize our de jure territorial demands, we must claim the various titles in Germany, Italy and Palestine that our Habsburg monarch has to his name.
translation: 为了最终完成我们的领土要求，我们必须要求在德国、意大利和巴勒斯坦的各种头衔上附上我们哈布斯堡王朝君主的名字。

original: Elect a Democratic King
translation: 选出民主派君主

original: We must seek a King who will uphold the democratic principles of our nation and the rights of our people.
translation: 我们必须寻找一位维护国家民主原则和人民权利的国王。

original: Responsible Government
translation: 责任政府制

original: Traditionally, the government has ultimately answered to the king, allowing it to ignore the will of the people. We will change the constitution to ensure that it is the people, and not the ruler, who holds the government responsible.
translation: 一直以来我们的政府是最终只对国王负责的，这使得它得以无视人民的意愿。我们将改变宪法来保证政府的负责对象是人民而不是统治者。

original: Rapprochement With Little Entente
translation: 与小协约国和解

original: Hostile ideologies surround us, and we must re-affirm our ties to our Little Entente neighbours. We will ask them if they wish to see us rearm.
translation: 敌对的意识形态环抱着我们，我们必须重新确定我们与我们小协约国邻国的关系。我们会询问他们是否希望看到我们重新武装起来。

original: Join the Allies
translation: 加入同盟国

original: The future of Hungary and its democratic values lies with the major Western democracies and their alliance. As a member of this alliance, we may lend our strength to theirs, as well as count on their support ourselves.
translation: 匈牙利的未来及其民主价值取决于西方主要民主国家及其联盟。作为这个联盟的成员，我们即可以增强他们的实力，还可以得到他们的支持。

original: The Balkan Pact
translation: 巴尔干公约

original: The democracies of the West are too far away to aid us, and so we must seek allies closer to home. As the leader of the Balkan Pact, we will offer them our protection and lead them to victory!
translation: 西方民主国家离我们太远，无法帮助我们，因此我们必须寻求更亲近的盟友。作为“巴尔干公约”的领导者，我们将为他们提供保护，并带领他们取得胜利！

original: An Unlikely Alliance
translation: 不可思议的联盟

original: We have changed our country fundamentally. We are no longer the war mongers of old. The time has come to reach out to our old enemy and forge a new destiny - together.
translation: 我们从根本上改变了我们国家。我们不再是旧时代的战争贩子。是时候向我们旧敌人伸出援手，共同创造一个新的命运。

original: Joint Oil Exploitation Company
translation: 联合石油开发公司

original: With the prospect of possible oil fields in our territory, we have attracted foreign attention. Friendly powers are eager to support our oil industry with their technical know-how, and this would be a lucrative opportunity to learn from their advances.
translation: 随着我国境内可能出现油田的前景，已引起了国外的关注。友好国家渴望利用他们的技术知识来支援我们的石油工业，这将是一个学习他们技术进步、有利可图的机会。

original: Elect a Fascist King
translation: 选出法西斯君主

original: Our nation needs a powerful leader to steer it through the coming turbulent years. Our ruler must be one that the people can look up to, and our enemies can fear.
translation: 我们国家需要一个强有力的领导人来带领它度过即将到来的动荡岁月。我们统治者必须是一位人民敬仰、敌人畏惧的伟人。

original: Economic Intervention
translation: 经济干预

original: We must direct ample political resources to direct our economy. Though it is adequate, we can make it stronger and more efficient yet.
translation: 我们必须引导充足的政治资源来指导我们的经济。虽然它可以勉强胜任，但我们可以使其变得更强大、更有效。

original: Strengthen Fascists
translation: 激励法西斯分子

original: Fascist elements in our country must be strengthened and given a public platform to spread their ideology. Their views on the future of Hungary are the most likely to lead the country to greatness once more.
translation: 我们必须加强对法西斯分子的宣传，为传播其意识形态提供一个公共平台。他们对匈牙利未来的看法最有可能使这个国家再次走向伟大。

original: Renounce the Treaty of Trianon
translation: 撕毁特里亚农条约

original: §YMiklós Horthy§! or §YFriedrich Franz of Mecklenburg-Schwerin§! becomes the country leader.\n
translation: §Y霍尔蒂·米克洛什§! 或 §Y弗里德里希·弗朗茨·梅克伦堡-什未林§!成为国家领导人。\n

original: The injustice forced upon our nation at the end of the Great War, ripping away two-thirds of our once-great nation's territory and population, rivals that of the disgrace visited upon Germany in the Treaty of Versailles, and it must be undone.
translation: 一战结束后，我们国家遭受了不公正的待遇，剥夺了我们曾经伟大的国家的三分之二的领土和人口，堪与凡尔赛条约中德国遭受的耻辱相提并论，它必须被废除。

original: Renew the Rome Protocols
translation: 重申罗马议定书

original: In light of Germany's continuing revisionism, we must renew the Rome Protocols drawn up and signed in 1934. The agreements would serve not only to further isolate the German and Yugoslavian threats, but also as a possible precursor to an actual alliance.
translation: 鉴于德国的持续修正主义，我们必须重申在1934年起草和签署的“罗马议定书”。这些协议不仅将进一步孤立德国和南斯拉夫的威胁，而且还可能成为一个真正联盟的前身。

original: Protect Austria
translation: 保护奥地利

original: To further stand against Germany we must resist their open ambitions for unification with Austria. We can grant them a guarantee, giving the current government the political strength they need to hopefully stand up to pro-German elements.
translation: 为了进一步反对德国，我们必须抵制他们与奥地利统一的野心。我们可以给予奥地利一个承诺，给现任政府他们所需要的政治力量，以支持他们对抗亲德分子。

original: Alliance With Italy
translation: 与意大利结盟

original: The initial overtures towards an alliance that were made in the Rome Protocols can now be expanded upon. We will send a delegation to Italy to discuss a binding agreement for extensive military co-operation, both defensively and offensively.
translation: 现在可以对“罗马议定书”最初提议的联盟进行扩展。我们将派一个代表团访问意大利，讨论一项具有约束力、在防御和进攻方面进行广泛军事合作的协议。

original: Trade Deal With Germany
translation: 与德国的贸易协议

original: The benefits to our industry of increased trade relations with Germany are clear, and claims of potential over-reliance of our economy on the Germans are exaggerated. We will go ahead and sign an extensive trade agreement.
translation: 增加我们与德国之间的贸易关系的好处是显而易见的，而且我们对德国经济过度依赖的说法被夸大了。我们将继续签署一份广泛的贸易协议。

original: Joint Aluminum Mining Company
translation: 联合铝业公司

original: As aluminum is an integral part of the modern war industry, we could easily obtain German support to expand the mines in the north of our country.
translation: 由于铝是现代战争工业不可或缺的一部分，我们可以很容易地得到德国的支持，以扩大我国北部矿产开采。

original: Join the Axis
translation: 加入轴心国

original: As our economy is already so reliant on the Germans, it is only logical that we shall follow them in war. We will send them a request for formal entry into the Axis alliance.
translation: 由于我们经济已经如此依赖德国，因此在战争中跟随他们是合乎逻辑的。我们将向他们发出正式加入轴心国的请求。

original: Reaffirm Territorial Claims
translation: 重申领土主张

original: With the rejection of the Treaty of Trianon, we must now proceed to reaffirm our claims to the territories that were stolen from us.
translation: 由于摒弃了特里亚农条约，我们现在必须重申我们对那些被窃取领土的主张。

original: Demand Transylvania
translation: 索取特兰西瓦尼亚

original: If we can regain our territories without bloodshed, so much the better. Romania will be given an ultimatum demanding the transfer of our rightful lands.
translation: 如果我们能在不流血的情况下收复我们的领土，那就再好不过了。我们将向罗马尼亚发出最后通牒，要求转交我们那些合法的领土。

original: Demand Southern Slovakia
translation: 索取南斯洛伐克

original: If we can regain our territories without bloodshed, so much the better. Czechoslovakia will be given an ultimatum demanding the transfer of our rightful lands.
translation: 如果我们能在不流血的情况下收复我们的领土，那就再好不过了。我们将向捷克斯洛伐克发出最后通牒，要求转交我们那些合法的领土。

original: Demand the Vojvodina
translation: 索取伏伊伏丁那

original: If we can regain our territories without bloodshed, so much the better. Yugoslavia will be given an ultimatum demanding the transfer of our rightful lands.
translation: 如果我们能在不流血的情况下收复我们的领土，那就再好不过了。我们将向南斯拉夫发出最后通牒，要求转交我们那些合法的领土。

original: Claim Overlordship Over Slovakia
translation: 索取斯洛伐克统治权

original: The remainder of Slovakia must also be re-integrated into the Hungarian state, either directly or by becoming a dependency. We will send another ultimatum.
translation: 斯洛伐克的其余部分也必须直接或通过成为附属国而重新融入匈牙利。我们将再次发出最后通牒。

original: Proclaim Greater Hungary
translation: 宣告大匈牙利的成立

original: Having regained the territory we were due, the size of our country has increased to our historical borders. We may now in full confidence proclaim the formation of Greater Hungary to the world, and set our eyes on new targets.
translation: 在收复了我们应得领土之后，我们国家的规模已经扩大到我们的历史边界。我们现在完全有信心向世人宣告，大匈牙利的成立，并将目光投向新的目标。

original: Change your name to §YGreater Hungary§!\n
translation: 更改你的国名为§Y大匈牙利§!\n

original: When demanding territory, the other side is more likely to hand it over without bloodshed if you have a strong army. However, they may still believe they can stand up to us if they are in a faction. \n
translation: 当要求领土的时候，如果你有一支强大的军队，另一方更可能在不流血的情况下移交权力。然而，如果他们在一个阵营中，他们可能仍然相信他们有能力对抗我们。\n

original: Assassinate Horthy
translation: 刺杀霍尔蒂

original: The old Great War admiral holds far too much power and influence in his current capacity as Regent of the Kingdom of Hungary, and his stance against communism is proving to be quite a problem for our comrades' efforts. He must be removed from power if our nation is to find its way to the Revolution.
translation: 这位一战时老海军上将利用他作为匈牙利王国摄政的身份，掌握了太多的权力和影响力，而他反共立场被证明对我们同志的努力来说已经成为一个很严重的问题。如果我们国家要走上革命的道路，他就必须被剥夺权力。

original: Council of People's Commissars
translation: 人民部长会议

original: A governing body must be created that can oversee the transition of Hungary into a communist state. Once this has been done, this Council will serve as the analogue to the Western system of a cabinet formed by ministers.
translation: 必须建立一个管理机构来监督匈牙利向共产主义国家的转变。一旦这样做，这个委员会将成为由部长们组成的仿效西方体系的内阁。

original: The Hungarian Red Army
translation: 匈牙利红军

original: All motherland-loving patriots must do their duty in defense of their homeland. We will form a Hungarian Red Army, following the example of the Soviets in the East, which will protect our fledgling Revolution.
translation: 凡是热爱祖国的爱国者，必须为保卫祖国而尽自己的职责。我们将仿效苏联的模式，建立一支匈牙利红军，这将保卫我们刚刚起步的革命。

original: Soviet-Hungarian Military Academy
translation: 苏联—匈牙利军事学院

original: Our army is nothing without its leadership. The Soviets have far more experience in military matters, so it may be beneficial to cooperate with them in the training of our finest military minds. To this end we will establish a military academy with the most skilled instructors from both our nations.
translation: 没有领导人，我们军队将是一群乌合之众。苏联在军事上有更多的经验，所以在训练我们最好的军事将领方面与他们合作也许是有益的。为此，我们将设立一个军事学院，由两国最有经验的教官组成。

original: Join Comintern
translation: 加入共产国际

original: The way forward for the Revolution lies with the Comintern. Standing together with our comrades, we will sweep aside capitalist injustice and the fascist threat that looms in the West.
translation: 革命的前进方向在于共产国际。我们将与我们的同志并肩站在一起，我们将摆脱资本主义的不公正和西方法西斯的威胁。

original: The Revolutionary Council
translation: 革命委员会

original: The Comintern has abandoned the struggle against imperialism, instead opting to settle for coexistence. If the workers of the world are to be free, we must carry the torch of Marx and Lenin forward - even against the Soviet Union, if need be.
translation: 共产国际已经放弃了反对帝国主义的斗争，而是选择与其和平共处。如果世界工人要解放，我们就必须高举马克思与列宁的火炬前进，如有必要，甚至可以对抗苏联。

original: Union of Communist Soviets
translation: 苏维埃共产主义联盟

original: Pressure Romania
translation: 施压罗马尼亚

original: As we focus on the Fascist danger in the West, we cannot allow a potential threat to continue to exist in our rear, especially not when it lies between ourselves and our allies to the East. Romania must be secured as a fellow communist state, or the important land routes to our allies must be turned over to ensure we are able to receive their support.
translation: 当我们关注西方的法西斯威胁时，我们不能让潜在的威胁继续存在于我们的后方，特别是这种威胁存在于我们与东方盟友之间。 罗马尼亚必须成为一个共产主义国家才能得到保障，否则我们盟友的重要路线必须被转移，以确保我们得到他们的援助。

original: Intervene In Czechoslovakia
translation: 干预捷克斯洛伐克

original: The Czechoslovaks have been awarded some of the territories taken from us in the Treaty of Trianon. At the same time, we know of the German designs on their lands. Perhaps we would be able to arrange a trade; our rightful lands in return for a guarantee of Soviet military support in the case of German aggression.
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克已经在特里亚农条约中获得我们的一些领土，与此同时，我们知道德国正在图谋夺取他们的土地。也许我们能够安排一次交易，在德国侵略的情况下，作为对苏联军事支援的保证，我们收回那些合法领土。

original: Industrial Revitalization
translation: 振兴工业

original: Our industrial base has dangerously decayed in recent years. We must make an effort to adopt new technologies to make up for lost ground.
translation: 近几年，我们的工业基地已经衰落了。我们必须努力采用新技术来弥补失地。

original: Support Urbanization
translation: 支持城市化

original: More and more people are leaving the villages and smaller towns to move to the big urban centers, looking for work in new factories. Even if we can not offer them employment straight away, we can build new city quarters to prepare the way for a later expansion.
translation: 越来越多的人离开村庄和小城镇搬到大城市中心，在新工厂寻找工作。即使我们不能立即提供就业机会，也可以建立新的城市区，为以后的扩张做好准备。

original: Institute for Industrial Techniques
translation: 工业技术研究所

original: The ad-hoc nature of industrial research has led to slower growth and lower productivity. We should create a new institute that bundles all research into new industrial methods.
translation: 工业研究的随意性导致了经济增长放缓和生产力下降。我们应该设立一个新的研究所，把其所有研究都纳入到新工业方法中。

original: Announce the Györ Program
translation: 宣布杰尔计划

original: Our military is dangerously weak, and it is imperative that we boost its size and fighting capability. To do this we must significantly bolster our industry, to keep up with the growing demands in equipment. The five-year Györ Program will increase government spending not only on the military itself, but also on ancillary sectors such as industry, agriculture, infrastructure, and education.
translation: 我们军队处境艰难，必须提高它的规模和战斗力。要做到这一点，我们必须大力扶植我们的工业，以跟上不断增长的军备需求。五年的杰尔计划将不仅增加政府在军事上的支出，还将增加工业、农业、基础设施和教育等配套行业的支出。

original: Civilian Industry
translation: 民用工业

original: Despite the need for more military industry, we must not neglect our civilian needs. An expansion of civilian industry is therefore in order.
translation: 尽管需要更多的军事工业，但我们决不能忽视我们平民的需求。因此，扩张民用工业是有序进行的。

original: Reintegrate the Railroads
translation: 重新整合铁路

original: The railway networks spanning the old Austria-Hungarian empire have become fragmented since its dissolution in independent nations. We should approach the other former constituent states and propose a reintegration of our railway networks, to improve the infrastructure overall.
translation: 自独立国家解体以来，横跨旧奥匈帝国的铁路网已经支离破碎。我们应与其他前组成国进行接触，并提出重新整合我们铁路网、全面改善基础设施的建议。

original: Invite Foreign Investors
translation: 邀请外国投资者

original: Hungary lies at the heart of Eastern Europe, and we could well use our central location to attract foreign investors with an interest in improving our infrastructure and industry.
translation: 匈牙利位于东欧的心脏地带，我们可以很好地利用我们的中心位置来吸引外国投资者，以改善我们的基础设施和工业。

original: Expand the Manfred Weiss Steel Works
translation: 扩大曼弗雷德·韦斯钢铁厂

original: The massive Manfed Weiss Steel Works have been an integral defense contractor since the Great War saw a huge expansion of the facilities. If we are to increase our military in preparation of the next war, the pride of our national industry will once more have to be enlarged.
translation: 自一战以来，规模庞大的曼弗雷德·韦斯钢铁厂一直是一个整体的国防承包商，这里的设施经历了大规模地扩张。如果我们要为下一场战争增加军力的话，我们民族工业的骄傲将再次得到扩张。

original: Expand the Aluminum Industry
translation: 扩大铝矿工业

original: We require all available resources, both for export and for domestic use. Our aluminum industry, though already expansive, has further room for improvement, and we should direct resources to this end immediately.
translation: 我们需要所有可供出口和国内使用的资源。虽然我们的铝业已经得到扩张，但还有进一步改进的空间，我们应立即将资源投入到这一领域。

original: Expand the Technical University of Budapest
translation: 扩大布达佩斯技术大学

original: We require more bright minds to come up with breakthrough discoveries that will aid us in the conflicts ahead. By expanding our capital's university we can increase the pool of skilled engineers and scientists for our military industry.
translation: 我们需要更多具有聪明才智的人才拿出突破性发现，帮助我们在未来的冲突取得技术优势。通过扩大我们首都的大学，我们可以增加军工业的技术工程师和科学家的数量。

original: Support Domestic Industry
translation: 支持国内工业

original: The military requires more equipment, and our industry must keep up. We will direct new resources to an expansion of our arms industry.
translation: 军队需要更多的装备，我们工业必须要跟上其步伐。我们将把新资源用于扩大我们的军需工业。

original: Domestic Arms Industry
translation: 国内军需工业

original: Our arms industry must be supported by a strong civilian industrial base, not only for production of industrial equipment but also for the establishment of new factories.
translation: 我们的军需工业必须得到强大的民用工业基地的支持，不仅用于生产工业设备，还用于建立新工厂。

original: Autarky
translation: 自给自足

original: We are far too dependent on foreign sources of oil. We should emulate the German efforts at developing synthetic oil.
translation: 我们太依赖外国石油了。我们应该效仿德国在开发合成油方面的努力。

original: Synthetic Industry
translation: 合成油工业

original: Now that we have mastered the technology to liquify coal, we can build a pilot plant to begin production.
translation: 现在我们已经掌握了液化煤的技术，我们可以建造一个试验厂来开始生产。

original: Adds a synthetic refinery to a random state. The location will be displayed once research has proven synthetic oil production is feasible.\n
translation: 在一个随机地区添加一个合成炼油厂，一旦研究证明合成油生产是可行的，这个地点就会显示出来。\n

original: Aeronautic Technology Institute
translation: 航空技术研究所

original: The air has become a new aspect of warfare, and is proving to be underestimated in importance by many. We must learn to master this new dimension, and allocate resources to the development of new doctrines and equipment that allow us to do so.
translation: 空战已让战争变得面目一新，并且很多人低估了其重要性。我们必须学会掌握这一新方面知识，并为发展新学说和装备调拨资源，使我们能够达到这一目标。

original: Boost Hungarian Aviation Industry
translation: 增强匈牙利航空工业

original: Our industrial base must be strengthened to allow for the production of new airplane models in sufficient quantities to gain mastery of the air.
translation: 我们的工业基地必须得到加强，以便生产出足够数量的新型飞机，来获得制空权。

original: Secret Rearmament
translation: 秘密重整军备

original: The restrictions imposed on us by the Treaty of Trianon prohibit us from increasing the size of our army. Even so, the world's political climate is becoming ever more turbulent, and conflict looms over the horizon. We cannot remain defenseless, and we must begin to rearm even if it means secretly breaking the stipulations of the peace treaty imposed on us after the Great War.
translation: 束缚我们的特里亚农条约禁止我们扩大军队规模。即便如此，世界的政治气候正变得更加动荡不安，冲突已迫在眉睫。我们不能保持毫无防备，我们必须开始重新武装，即使这意味着秘密打破了一战后对我们施加的和平条约的规定。

original: War Games
translation: 军事演习

original: By engaging in small-scale war games, we can discover flaws in our current military structure, and use the experience gained to adjust deficiencies.
translation: 通过参加小规模的军事演习，我们可以发现当前军事结构的缺陷，并利用所获得的经验来弥补不足之处。

original: Theoretical Air Efforts
translation: 重视空战理论

original: We must spend ample resources on working out new theories regarding air warfare. If we go to war the theories that may be developed will be invaluable.
translation: 我们必须花大量的精力来制定关于空战的新理论。如果我们参战，那些研究出来的理论将是无价的。

original: Bled Agreement
translation: 布莱德协议

original: Small-scale secret re-armament will not suffice. We must reach out to our neighbors and request redress of the treaty imposed on us after the Great War. Hungary has an equal right to armament.
translation: 小规模的秘密重整军备是不够的。我们必须向邻国伸出援手，并要求纠正一战后强加给我们的条约。匈牙利拥有平等发展军备的权利。

original: Establish the Air Force
translation: 建立空军

original: With legal restrictions now out of the way, it is time to officially establish the Hungarian air force.
translation: 随着法律限制的解除，现在是时候正式建立起匈牙利空军了。

original: Indigenous Designs
translation: 自主设计

original: Our own technical expertise is sufficient for our needs. Control over our own design bureau enables us to allocate more resources to it, thereby increasing the speed of development of new designs.
translation: 我们自己的技术专长足以满足我们的需求。我们可以掌控自己的设计局，为其调拨更多的资源，从而加快新设计的开发速度。

original: Heavy Fighter Effort
translation: 重视重型战斗机

original: Our fighters must be able to support the more vulnerable bomber airplanes. This requires heavier armament and longer range at the cost of some speed and maneuverability.
translation: 我们的战斗机必须能够支援易受攻击的轰炸机。这需要更重的装备和更长的航程，以牺牲一定的速度和机动性为代价。

original: Light Fighter Effort
translation: 重视轻型战斗机

original: We need fighter aircraft to acquire local air superiority in the skies above our forces, and to intercept any enemy planes that threaten our nation.
translation: 我们需要战斗机在我们部队上空获得空中优势，并拦截任何威胁我们国家的敌机。

original: CAS Focus
translation: 重视近距支援机

original: A modern army needs support from vehicles not only on the ground, but also in the air.
translation: 现代化战争不仅需要地面的支援，还需要空中支援。

original: Tactical Bomber Focus
translation: 重视战术轰炸机

original: Victory will be achieved by annihilating the enemy's ground forces. We must focus on supporting our own armies with tactical strikes against close and deep targets.
translation: 胜利将通过消灭敌人的地面部队来实现。我们必须把重点放在对近距离和纵深目标的战术打击上，以支援我们的部队。

original: License Foreign Designs
translation: 外国设计的许可证

original: Foreign air forces have already shown that they possess tried-and-proven designs of very high quality. Rather than tempt fate and rely on our nascent aeronautical expertise, we should request to be allowed to produce these foreign models under license.
translation: 外国空军已经表明，他们拥有经过验证的高质量的设计。我们应该请求允许在许可证下生产这些外国机型，而不应该冒不必要风险及仅依靠我们刚刚起步的航空专业知识。

original: Fighter Competition
translation: 战斗机比赛

original: In order for us to be able to select the best model of fighter airplane to produce under license, we must pit the contenders against each other. We will organize a fighter competition and invite all major powers to send their most modern fighter models to participate.
translation: 为了让我们能够选择最佳的战斗机型用于许可证下的生产，我们必须让竞争者相互竞争。我们将组织一场战斗机比赛，并邀请所有大国派出他们最现代化的战斗机型来参赛。

original: Bomber Competition
translation: 轰炸机比赛

original: In order for us to be able to select the best model of bomber airplane to produce under license, we must pit the contenders against each other. We will organize a bomber competition and invite all major powers to send their most modern bomber models to participate.
translation: 为了让我们能够选择最佳的轰炸机型用于许可证下的生产，我们必须让竞争者相互竞争。我们将组织一场轰炸机比赛，并邀请所有大国派出他们最现代化的轰炸机型来参赛。

original: Joint Air Development
translation: 联合空军研发

original: The best means of developing new aircraft models is through cooperation with our allies. By bringing together the brightest minds of all our nations, we will attain the best results.
translation: 研制新型飞机模型的最佳方法是通过与我们盟国的合作。通过汇集我们各国最聪明的人才，我们将取得最好的成果。

original: Army Maneuvers
translation: 陆军演习

original: Our army must be brought back in shape for potential future armed conflicts. We will send them on maneuvers to develop new tactics and strategies.
translation: 为了应对未来可能发生的武装冲突，我们陆军必须恢复原状。我们将派遣他们进行军事演习，以制定新战术和战略。

original: Mobile Focus
translation: 重视机动化

original: A mobile army, with the capacity to strike when and where it will do the most damage, is the key to military success.
translation: 机动部队有能力在任何时间及地点进行最大程度的破坏，这是取得军事成功的关键。

original: The Botond
translation: 博通德卡车

original: To adequately meet our supply and transportation demands we require a new form of truck. Initial renditions of the Rába 38M Botond design have proven to be successful in trials, and with appropriate resources we can finalize the design and begin production.
translation: 为了充分满足我们的供应和运输需求，我们需要一种新型卡车。拉巴·博通德38M设计的初始版本已在试验中被证明是成功的车型。通过调拨资源，我们可以完成设计并开始生产。

original: Develop Tanks
translation: 研制坦克

original: The nations surrounding us have identified the importance of the tank, and are producing them in great numbers. We must develop our own tank designs and attempt to keep up with our allies and adversaries.
translation: 我们周边国家已经确认了坦克的重要性，并大量生产它们。我们必须研制自己的坦克设计，并努力赶上我们盟国和敌人的步伐。

original: Assault Gun Focus
translation: 重视突击炮

original: Rather than focus on full-fledged tanks, we will instead rely on assault guns to air our infantry in affecting break-throughs, as a more cost-effective alternative.
translation: 与其把注意力集中在成熟的坦克上，还不如依靠我们的突击炮使步兵获得突破能力，这是一种更划算的选择。

original: Joint Tank Procurement
translation: 联合坦克采购

original: Together with our allies we can develop new tank models much more effectively. We will set up a joint procurement bureau where our engineers can work together to identify the best designs to move forward with.
translation: 联合我们的盟友，我们可以更有效地开发新的坦克模型。我们将设立一个联合采购局，在那里我们工程师可以共同努力，找出最佳设计方案。

original: Armored Warfare
translation: 装甲战

original: Our motorized divisions will require armored support to be truly effective. We must pour more resources into the development of new armor designs.
translation: 我们的摩托化师需要装甲支援才能真正起作用。我们必须投入更多的资源来研发新的装甲设计。

original: Mobile Corps Doctrine
translation: 机动部队学说

original: With both motorized and armor elements now in production, we must look at new theoretical approaches to how these can work together on the battlefield.
translation: 随着摩托化部队和装甲部队正在生产，我们必须寻找新的理论方法来解决这些部队在战场上协同作战的问题。

original: Home Defense
translation: 本土防御

original: Small mobile forces will not be able to defend our nation in the case of attack. We must form an impenetrable front-line, and develop new doctrines to increase the effectiveness of such an approach.
translation: 在发生袭击的情况下，小型机动部队将无法捍卫我们的国家。我们必须形成一个不可逾越的前线，发展新学说，以提高这种方法的效力。

original: Danuvia Submachine Guns
translation: 丹纽维亚冲锋枪

original: Our infantry requires good weaponry to improve their effectiveness. The initial Danuvia 43M prototypes have performed well in tests, and by increasing funding for its development we may soon be able to begin producing the weapon en masse.
translation: 我们步兵需要好的武器来提高作战效能。丹纽维亚43m原型的最初版本在测试中表现良好，通过增加其开发资金，我们很快就可以开始大量生产该武器。

original: Artillery Effort
translation: 重视火炮

original: Artillery is key for improved effectiveness of our forces. We will develop modern artillery models so that they will have the best artillery support we can provide.
translation: 火炮是提高我军效能的关键。我们将研发现代火炮模型，使他们能拥有最好的火炮支援。

original: Motorized Logistics
translation: 摩托化后勤

original: The key to mobile warfare is the ability to move men and material across large distances quickly. Even the best tank will quickly become useless if it is not resupplied.
translation: 机动战的关键在于能够快速地将人员和物资运送到很远的地方。即使是最好的坦克，如果没有补给，它也会很快变得毫无用处。

original: Light Infantry Divisions Doctrine
translation: 轻步兵师学说

original:
Enables §HLight Infantry Divisions Doctrine§!
§HInfantry
    Forest§!
      Attack: §G+2%§!
      Movement: §G+5%§!
    §HUrban§!
      Attack: §G+5%§!
      Movement: §G+5%§!
translation:
启用 §H轻步兵师学说§!
§H步兵
    森林§!
      攻击：§G+2%§!
      移动：§G+5%§!
    §H城市§!
      攻击：§G+5%§!
      移动：§G+5%§!

original: \nGain a §YInfantry§! unit with 6 battalions.\n
translation: \n获得一个6营编制的§Y步兵§!单位。\n

original: We must make do with the limited manpower at our disposal. If we want more divisions, they necessarily have to be smaller. Light infantry divisions provide an optimal mix of striking power and size, and we will make it the backbone of our military.
translation: 我们必须利用好我们手头有限的人力。如果我们想要更多师，他们必须更小型化。轻型步兵师提供了最佳打击力和部队规模的组合，我们将使其成为我们部队的骨干。

original: Form Parachute Battalions
translation: 组建伞兵营

original: Infantry landed by air assault will give us the capability to react quickly to any unexpected threat or tactical opportunity.
translation: 通过空袭投放步兵，将使我们有能力对任何意外威胁或战术时机做出迅速的反应。

original: Naval Warfare
translation: 海军作战

original: After regaining a coastline, we must focus our efforts on rebuilding a fleet fit for a major power.
translation: 在重获海岸线后，我们必须集中精力重建一支适合大国的海军舰队。

original: Restoration
translation: 传统海军

original: We can not waste time on experimenting with new and unproven technologies. We will stick with tried and tested designs from the days of the old Empire.
translation: 我们不能把时间浪费在试验新的、未经证实的技术上。我们将坚持旧帝国时代的经过试验和测试设计。

original: Reform
translation: 改良海军

original: It makes little sense to create a navy built around outdated ideas. We have been give the opportunity to create a new navy from scratch, without the baggage of the old. We should use it to build the most modern and capable navy we can.
translation: 建立一支以过时观念为基础的海军是毫无意义的。我们已经有机会从头开始创建一支新型海军，而不需要背负旧包袱。我们应该用新理念来建立一支最现代化、最胜任的海军。

original: Capital Ships
translation: 主力舰

original: The core of a navy is the battleship. We must make up for lost time and begin construction of new vessels as soon as possible.
translation: 海军的核心是战列舰。我们必须弥补失去的时间，尽快开始建造新船。

original: Destroyers
translation: 驱逐舰

original: Destroyers are a vital, but often overlooked, part of the fleet. Together with the low cost, they are a good start for any naval expansion program.
translation: 驱逐舰是舰队中至关重要但经常被忽视的部分。加上其低成本，它们是任何海军扩张计划的良好开端。

original: Cruisers
translation: 巡洋舰

original: Even the most potent force is useless if it can not find the enemy or protect itself against aircraft. Designing new light and heavy cruisers helps us turn a collection of ships into an actual fleet.
translation: 即使是最强大的舰队，如果不能找到敌人或保护自己免受飞机的伤害，也是无用的。设计新的轻型和重型巡洋舰有助于我们将一批船只转变为一支真正的舰队。

original: Submarines
translation: 潜艇

original: Submarines came close to beating the most powerful navy on the planet in the last war. We can not be taken seriously as a modern navy if we do not posess submarines of our own.
translation: 在上一次战争中，潜艇几乎击败了世界上最强大的海军。如果我们不拥有自己的潜艇，我们就不能被认为是现代海军。

original: Carriers
translation: 航空母舰

original: The battleship is a relic of a time long gone. The future of naval warfare is the carrier and the airplane. We will be at the forefront of this development.
translation: 战列舰是很久以前的遗留物。海战的未来是航母和飞机。我们将走在这个发展的最前沿。

original: Must have a modern fighter to offer and be at peace with [Root.GetName]
translation: 必须能提供一支现代化战斗机并与[Root.GetName]处于和平状态。

original: Must have a modern bomber to offer and be at peace with [Root.GetName]
translation: 必须能提供一支现代化轰炸机并与[Root.GetName]处于和平状态。

original: Preserve Greater Romania
translation: 维持大罗马尼亚

original: We have at last managed to unite all Romanian speakers in our country. Now, we must ensure that our children may inherit our legacy of a Romania for all Romanians.
translation: 我们至少已经将所有讲罗马尼亚语的同胞团结进我们的国家了。现在，我们必须确保我们的孩子能够继承我们的遗产，亦即一个为全体罗马尼亚人的罗马尼亚。

original: A Deal with the Devil
translation: 与恶魔的交易

original: Communism threatens our eastern border, and territorial demands may only be just over the horizon. Perhaps it would be better to join the Soviets rather than fight them.
translation: 共产主义威胁着我们的东部边境，而他们的领土要求似乎已经是板上钉钉的事情了。也许加入苏联那一方会比和他们对抗来得更好一些。

original: Form Peasant Militias
translation: 组建农民民兵

original: With the communist ideals that we take from our neighbour comes the duty of every man to defend his comrades, his country, and the revolution.
translation: 我们从我们的邻居那边引介的共产主义思想要求每一个人尽他的责任，来保卫他的同志，他的国家，以及革命的事业。

original: Basing Rights for Soviet Union
translation: 为苏联提供驻军权

original: We know the Soviets desire our territory, but we might be able to preclude any hostilities by offering our neighbour basing rights.
translation: 我们知道苏联觊觎我们的领土，但我们也许能够通过为我们亲爱的邻居提供驻军权来避免敌对行为。

original: Romanian Volunteer Brigades
translation: 罗马尼亚志愿旅

original: We will establish volunteer brigades in an effort to support fledgling revolutions in other nations.
translation: 我们将建立志愿旅来支援其他国家正在萌芽的革命事业。

original: Join Comintern
translation: 加入共产国际

original: The time has come to finally petition for membership in the Comintern. This will protect our territory against claims from the East, and enable us to more actively champion the cause of communism globally.
translation: 成为共产国际光荣一员的时刻已经到来。这将保卫我们的领土免受东面的声索，并使得我们能够更加主动地在世界范围内输出共产主义革命。

original: Trade Treaty with Germany
translation: 与德国的贸易条约

original: We know of the German economic interest in our country. Arranging increased delivery of goods such as oil will enable us to request German aid in modernizing our military.
translation: 我们知道德国经济对我们国家大有裨益。增加物资例如石油的出口能使我们要求德国援助我们，以现代化我们的军队。

original: German-Romanian Oil Exploitation Company
translation: 德国-罗马尼亚石油开发公司

original: German need for oil is tremendous, providing us with a lucrative opportunity to expand our oil refineries.
translation: 德国饥渴地索求着原油供应，这为我们提供了机会来扩大我们的炼油业。

original: Invite German Advisors
translation: 邀请德国顾问

original: German aid is essential if we want to modernize our military. They possess the technical know-how that we require, and so we should request the help of their advisors.
translation: 如果我们想要现代化我们的军队，德国的援助就是至关重要的。他们拥有我们急需的技术知识，因此我们要寻求他们顾问的帮助。

original: Permit Germany to station troops on Romanian soil.\n
translation: 允许德国在罗马尼亚领土驻军\n

original: License German Equipment
translation: 德国装备生产许可

original: German equipment is superior to our own, but perhaps we could obtain the licenses to produce these weapons, ourselves.
translation: 德国人的武器比我们自己的武器好太多，但也许我们能取得生产那些武器的许可，由我们自己来生产。

original: Join the Axis
translation: 加入轴心国

original: The time has come to join the Axis, so that we may carve out a glorious Romanian future alongside the Germans.
translation: 加入轴心国的时候到来了，站在德国一边我们也许能够开拓出一个罗马尼亚的光辉未来。

original: Demand Transnistria
translation: 索取德涅斯特

original: Now that we are strong and have German backing, the time has come to demand the region of Transnistria, incorporating it into Greater Romania.
translation: 现在我们很强大并且有德国为我们撑腰，是时候索取德涅斯特地区了，把这片土地纳入大罗马尼亚。

original: Renew Romanian-Polish Alliance
translation: 重申罗马尼亚-波兰同盟

original: Our old ties with Poland have cooled in recent years. As the threats surrounding us have not diminished, and the global political situation grows ever more tumultuous, the time has come to revive our alliance with our northern neighbour.
translation: 我们与波兰的历史纽带在这些年间被冷落了。鉴于围绕着我们的威胁并没有减弱，而全球的政治形势日益激进，是时候重新恢复与我们北方邻国的同盟了。

original: The Cordon Sanitaire
translation: 隔离线

original: We are bordered by dangerous ideologies both to the east and to the west. Together with our neighbours to the north and south, we will establish a barrier, quarantining these dogmas and preventing them from advancing any further.
translation: 我们与东面和西面的危险意识形态接壤。因此我们需要与北方和南方的邻国结盟，建立起一道防线，以对抗这些危险的教条并阻止其进一步扩散。

original: Demand a Western Guarantee
translation: 要求西方保障独立

original: If we are to stand against both communism and fascism, we will require Western aid. We will use all of the political leverage at our disposal to obtain such a guarantee.
translation: 如果我们要同时与共产主义和法西斯主义对抗，我们将需要西方的帮助。我们将用上我们所有的政治筹码来获取这样一种独立保障。

original: Military Modernization
translation: 军事现代化

original: Even with Western support, we must see to modernizing the army, so that our allies have time to support us before all is lost.
translation: 即使有了西方的支持，我们也必须寻求现代化我们的军队。这样我们的盟友才会有时间在一切都覆灭之前赶来支援。

original: Join the Allies
translation: 加入同盟国

original: A guarantee is not enough - it is time to declare for the Western democracies fully, and stand with them in defense of liberty.
translation: 一个独立保障还是不够的，是时候完全倒向西方民主势力了，并且和他们站在一起保卫自由世界。

original: Joint Allied Staff College
translation: 盟军联合参谋学院

original: In light of our shared interests, we should cooperate with the Western powers in the development of military equipment and tactics.
translation: 从我们的共同利益出发，我们应当与西方列强在发展军事装备和战术方面合作。

original: Civil Works
translation: 民用建设

original: Greater Romania will require an extensive program of industrial development if it is to support a large-scale military build-up. We will start it now.
translation: 如果要支援大规模的军队建设，大罗马尼亚就需要一个广泛的工业发展计划。我们将从现在开始着手。

original: National Defense Industry
translation: 国防工业

original: We must greatly expand our national arms industry if we are to keep up with increased demands.
translation: 我们必须极大地扩张我们国家的军事工业，如果我们要跟上日益增长的需求的话。

original: Agrarian Reform
translation: 农业改革

original: Our agrarian sector has ample room for improvement. Streamlining it and improving its efficiency will free up work forces that can be employed in other sectors, such as construction and arms production.
translation: 我们的农业部门有很大的改进空间。将其流水线化并改进其效率将释放更多劳动力进入其他生产部门，例如建筑和武器生产。

original: Danubian Transport Network
translation: 多瑙河运输网络

original: Our transport capabilities alongside the Danube can be drastically improved upon, both by utilizing the river itself more effectively and the way it is connected to our road and rail networks.
translation: 我们在多瑙河的运输能力可以大幅改进，具体措施包括更加有效率地运用河流本身以及改进河运与我们路网的联结。

original: MALAXA
translation: 马拉夏

original: We must expand our domestic automobile industry, so that it may be easily converted and appropriated for military purposes, when required. To this end, one of our business tycoons has some rather interesting ideas that we could make use of...
translation: 我们必须扩大我们的国有汽车工业，这样在需要的时候我们就能够更容易将其转化并划拨用于军事目的。在这方面，我们的一个商业大亨有一些相当有趣的主意而我们可以加以利用。

original: Invite Foreign Motor Companies
translation: 邀请外国机动车公司

original: Rather than expend resources on increasing production of unproven domestic automobile designs, we would benefit more from producing tried and tested foreign designs under license.
translation: 比起花费资源在多生产不可靠的国产机动车设计型号上，我们还不如取得国外经充分测试型号的生产许可，这样获益得更多。

original: Hunedoara Steel Works
translation: 胡内多阿拉钢铁工业

original: To feed the needs of our arms production the great steel works in Transylvania must be modernized and drastically expanded.
translation: 为满足我们武器生产的需求，特兰西瓦尼亚的大型钢铁工业必须被现代化并大规模扩张。

original: Invest In the IAR
translation: 投资IAR

original: It is critical to keep up with the demands of a modern airforce. Our industry must be capable not only of building the machines we require in the first place, but also of doing so at a pace fast enough to replace operational losses.
translation: 跟上现代空军力量的需求是至关重要的。我们的工业必须有能力不仅建造我们初步需要的飞机，而且能够足够快以补充上我们在行动中的损失数量。

original: Expand Ploiesti Oil Production
translation: 扩大普洛耶什蒂石油生产

original: We possess some of the largest oil fields in Europe in Ploiesti, and these are of tremendous importance not only for ourselves, but also for our allies and other nations in the region. We should increase the fields' production to better meet the demands.
translation: 我们在普洛耶什蒂拥有一些欧洲最大的油田，这些油田不仅对我们来说十分重要，对我们的盟友和该地区的其它国家来说也显得十分重要。我们应当增加这些油田的产量以更好地满足需求。

original: Expand the University of Bucharest
translation: 扩大布加勒斯特大学

original: By improving the quality and capacity of our university, we can increase the pool of best and brightest that we rely on for our technological advances.
translation: 通过改善我们大学的质量与容量，我们可以增加我们科技进步所需的最好和最聪明的人才。

original: Exploit the Baita Mines
translation: 开采巴伊塔矿产

original: It is beginning to become clear that uranium is of vital importance to some of the most drastic technological advances in weaponry since the invention of the firearm. We are lucky enough to have a large deposit of the stuff within our borders, and we should set up a mine to exploit it.
translation: 我们已经渐渐明白铀对于某些武器科技进步是一种极为重要的资源，这种进步也许是自火器发明以来最为重大的。我们很幸运在我们的领土内有着大量的铀矿储存，而我们应当建设一个矿井来开采它们。

original: Balkans Dominance
translation: 巴尔干霸权

original: The key to a prosperous Romanian future lies not with the revolutionaries of the East, or the democracies or fascists of the West, but with Romanian dominance of the balkans.
translation: 通往强盛罗马尼亚的未来的关键并不在于东面的革命者，也不在于西面的民主主义者和法西斯主义者，而是在于罗马尼亚自己对巴尔干的统御。

original: Puppet Bulgaria
translation: 傀儡保加利亚

original: Warmongering Bulgaria has long been a thorn in their neighbors' sides. We must subjugate them once and for all.
translation: 好战的保加利亚长久以来一直被邻国视为眼中的刺。我们必须一劳永逸地制服他们。

original: Align Hungary
translation: 结盟匈牙利

original: Hungary must be made to see our point of view. Their government is led by misguided elements that can only serve to lead the country to ruin. They would be stronger with us.
translation: 必须要让匈牙利了解我们的立场。他们的政府被误信的精英所领导，这只会带领他们的国家走向毁灭。他们和我们站在一起将会更加强大。

original: Hungary aligned
translation: 与匈牙利结盟

original: Secure Greece
translation: 确保希腊安全

original: Greece - though often an ally in the past - must be made to accept Romanian dominance in the region.
translation: 希腊 - 尽管在过去一直是盟友 - 必须接受罗马尼亚在这片地区的霸权。

original: Divide Yugoslavia
translation: 肢解南斯拉夫

original: The current arrangement of the balkan states making up Yugoslavia is not maintainable. We will issue an ultimatum requiring a restructuring of their component states, under Romanian leadership.
translation: 国际社会最新的对巴尔干国家的安排方案使得南斯拉夫成为一个难以维持的国家。我们将发布一个最后通牒要求重组他们的各个加盟国，当然是在罗马尼亚的主导下。

original: Split Czechoslovakia
translation: 分裂捷克斯洛伐克

original: Secure the Bosporus
translation: 确保博斯普鲁斯海峡安全

original: Our naval access is, for now, limited to the Black Sea. Turkey, straddling the Bosporus Strait, could block our access to the mediterranean in the case of war, and so we must ensure free passage for when we have need of it.
translation: 我们海军目前能到达的地方还是被限缩在黑海中。土耳其，跨有博斯普鲁斯海峡，在战时可能会阻挡我们通向地中海的道路。因此我们必须确保我们在需要的时候能够自由通行海峡。

original: Institute Royal Dictatorship
translation: 确立皇室独裁

original: The time has come to further increase the King's already-extensive powers, bringing political stability to the nation and enabling it to focus on threats from outside.
translation: 是时候进一步强化我们国王已有的政治权力了，这将为我们的国家带来政治稳定并使其能够专注于外部的威胁。

original: Fortify the Borders
translation: 巩固边境

original: Now that the domestic situation is under control, we must look at improving the defence of our borders from outside threats.
translation: 现在国内的局势已经被控制住了，而我们必须注重改善我们边境对外部威胁的防御。

original: Flexible Foreign Policy
translation: 灵活的外交政策

original: We must abandon our principles and forge relations with whoever it would be more practical to do so with. Our survival depends on it.
translation: 我们必须放弃我们的原则并与任何对我们有用的国家缔结关系。我们的生存取决于此。

original: His Majesty's Loyal Government
translation: 国王陛下忠实的政府

original: Domestic loyalty is paramount, and as long as the nation stands behind its King a pragmatic foreign policy is unnecessary.
translation: 国内的忠诚是至关重要的，而只要整个国家能和他们的国王站在一起，那么务实骑墙的外交政策就是不必要的了

original: Militarize the Sentinels
translation: 武装边哨

original: The paramilitary Sentinels could easily be transformed into a fully-fledged military organization, provided we allocate the appropriate resources.
translation: 准军事的哨兵能够很容易地被转变为一个完全成熟的军事组织，只要我们能够合理地分配资源的话。

original: All Parties Must End
translation: 天下无不散之宴席

original: No party lasts forever, and the current geopolitical situation requires our King's undivided attention. He may throw one cracker of a party once the war is over, but for now he must leave his hedonistic ways behind him.
translation: 天下无不散之宴席，而当下的地缘政治局势要求我们的国王心无旁骛。战争结束他也许可以再开一桌酒宴，但现在我们必须让他告别享乐主义的生活方式来担起责任。

original: Revise the Constitution
translation: 修订宪法

original: §YCarol II§! is the current country leader.
translation: §Y卡罗尔二世§! 现在是国家的领袖。

original: §YCarol II§! is not the country leader.
translation: §Y卡罗尔二世§! 现在不是国家的领袖。

original: The constitution must be rewritten to solidify the King's position as the nation's leader. Furthermore, dangerous far-right movements can be undermined by providing a safer alternative in the King's Sentinel of the Motherland youth organization.
translation: 宪法必须被修订以巩固国王作为国家领袖的地位。并且，极右翼的青年组织运动也可以被消解，通过提供一种更加安全的替代出口，亦即国王的卫队 - 祖国的哨兵Straja Țării。

original: The Royal Foundation
translation: 皇家基金会

original: The King has graciously agreed to create a foundation in his name to study Romanian culture and create the science of the nation.
translation: 国王仁慈地御准成立一个以他的名字命名的基金会，来研究罗马尼亚的文化和科学事业。

original: Appoint Pro-Soviet Government
translation: 任命亲苏维埃政府

original: The future of Romania hinges on good relations with our communist eastern neighbour. We must appoint a government that understands this reality.
translation: 罗马尼亚的未来取决于我们与东面共产主义邻居的良好关系。我们必须委任一个明白这一现实的政府。

original: Securitate
translation: 秘密警察

original: We must establish an expansive secret police organization to subdue internal threats to our new government.
translation: 我们必须建立一个庞大的秘密警察组织来消除针对我们新政府的内部威胁。

original: Appoint Pro-Axis Government
translation: 任命亲轴心国政府

original: The future of Romania hinges on good relations with the up-and-coming Fascist powers in the West. We must appoint a government that understands this reality.
translation: 罗马尼亚的未来取决于我们与西面新兴法西斯势力的良好关系。我们必须委任一个明白这一现实的政府。

original: Removes §YConstitutional Guarantees§! and §YSecuritate§!\n
translation: 移除 §Y宪法保障§! 和 §Y秘密警察§!\n

original: Removes §YIron Guard§! and §YSecuritate§!\n
translation: 移除 §Y铁卫团§! 和 §Y秘密警察§!\n

original: Removes §YConstitutional Guarantees§! and §YIron Guard§!\n
translation: 移除 §Y宪法保障§! 和 §Y铁卫团§!\n

original: Iron Guard
translation: 铁卫团

original: It is time to reconsider our policy concerning the Iron Guard. With our new government, the movement is now much more in line with our official standpoints, and could serve as an excellent tool to increase the nation's political stability.
translation: 现在是时候重新考虑我们对铁卫团的政策了。由于我们新政府的上台，这项运动现在更加与我们的官方立场相接近，并且可以作为一个优秀的工具来增加我们国家的政治稳定性。

original: Force Abdication
translation: 强迫退位

original: King Carol II is no longer required, and, indeed, is proving to be more of a hassle than a leader. Though he still has extensive control over the nation's government and finances, he must be made to abdicate for the long-term good of Romania.
translation: 国王卡罗尔二世不再被需要了，而且他确实被证明更像是一个麻烦而非是一个领袖。虽然他仍然具有对国家政府和经济的广泛的影响力，但为了罗马尼亚的长远利益考虑必须要强迫他退位。

original: Appoint Pro-Allied Government
translation: 任命亲同盟国政府

original: The future of Romania hinges on good relations with our old allies in the West - France and her allies. We must appoint a government that continues these relationships.
translation: 罗马尼亚的未来取决于我们与西方我们老盟友 - 法国和她的小伙伴的良好关系。我们必须委任一个能维持这种关系的政府。

original: Constitutional Guarantees
translation: 宪法保障

original: The constitional chances that have been implemented by the King must be reverted, and guarantees and balances must be introduced to ensure this does not happen again. Otherwise, all we are left with is a mockery of democracy.
translation: 国王推行的宪法改变必须被回复，而保障民主和平衡的原则必须被引入以确保这样的事情不会再次发生。否则的话，我们所剩下的只不过是对民主的嘲讽。

original: Handle the King
translation: 处置国王

original: Legistlation must be put in place to curtail the King's exuberant lifestyle. The national treasury may no longer be appropriated for his personal expenses.
translation: 必须进行立法以限制国王奢靡的生活方式。国库可能将不会负担他的个人开支了。

original: King Michael's Coup
translation: 米哈伊国王政变

original: The current government is bringing Romania to ruin. A firm hand is required to steer the nation away from disaster - the hand of Prince Michael.
translation: 当前的政府正在带领罗马尼亚走向毁灭。我们需要一个强有力的手腕来使这个国家远离灾难，这人就是米哈伊王子。

original: Expand the Air Force
translation: 扩编空军

original: Modern wars cannot be won without dominating the skies. We must do everything in our power to develop the Romanian air force!
translation: 现代战争不可能在没有统治天空的情况下打赢。我们必须尽一切力量来发展罗马尼亚空军。

original: Acquire Licenses
translation: 要求生产许可

original: Foreign aviation technology is superior to ours, and we should look at obtaining licenses so that we may produce airplanes with their innovations, ourselves.
translation: 外国的航空科技比我们来得先进，而我们应该寻求取得生产许可，这样我们就可以自己生产他们创新成果下的飞机型号。

original: Air Defense
translation: 防空力量

original: We must protect our borders with extensive anti-air batteries, to relieve the strain on our small air force.
translation: 我们必须用大量的防空火炮保卫我们的边境，以为我们的小小空军保存机场。

original: Heavy Interceptors
translation: 重型截击机

original: Our country can not support a large airforce. We must concentrate as much firepower as possible in each plane to destroy any attacker.
translation: 我们国家不能支持大型的空中力量。我们必须尽可能注重每一架飞机的火力来摧毁任何攻击者。

original: Ground Support
translation: 地面支援

original: Combined arms is an essential tenet of modern-day warfare. The air force must be trained to support our land forces, when needed.
translation: 兵种协同作战是现代战争的基本宗旨。空军力量必须被训练来在需要的时候支援我们的地面部队。

original: Medium Bombers
translation: 中型轰炸机

original: The era is past when armies could win wars without looking to the skies. We must develop our tactical bombers to provide our soldiers with the air support they need.
translation: 军队不需要注意天空也能取得胜利的时代已经过去了。我们必须发展我们自己的战术轰炸机来在需要时为我们的士兵提供空中支援。

original: CAS
translation: 近地支援机

original: We require dedicated airplane models, specifically designed for close air support, if we are to get the most out of our combined forces.
translation: 如果我们要最大程度发挥我们兵种协同作战的力量，我们就需要设计专门的飞机型号专用于执行近地支援作战。

original: Acquire Fighters
translation: 获取战斗机

original: Air superiority is key for our defense, and it is therefore essential that we expand our fighter forces by any means possible.
translation: 空中优势是我们防御的关键，因此通过任何可用手段来扩张我们的战斗机力量就显得至关重要。

original: Local Development
translation: 地面发展

original: We will rely on the domestic Romanian aeronautical industry to produce the airplanes we need.
translation: 我们将依赖罗马尼亚国内的航空工业来生产我们需要的飞机。

original: Air Superiority
translation: 空中优势

original: Mastery of the air is an essential requirement for military operations, and it is this aspect of air warfare that we must focus on.
translation: 掌控天空是军事行动的至要需求，而这正是我们在空中作战领域需要关注的方面。

original: Strategic Bomber Force
translation: 战略轰炸机

original: Military operations are secondary only to the destruction of the enemy's industry and infrastructure. Strategic bombing is the means by which we will achieve that.
translation: 在摧毁敌方工业和基建的重要性面前军事行动都是第二位的。战略轰炸是我们必须要掌握的手段。

original: Heavy Bombers
translation: 重型轰炸机

original: Our strategic bombing forces require ample range and bomb loads. Large bombers are the only viable option to achieve these requirements.
translation: 我们的战略轰炸理论需要充足的航程和载弹量。大型轰炸机是唯一可选的方案来满足这些需求。

original: Nuclear Bomb Project
translation: 核弹计划

original: We can never hope to out-bomb our likely enemies via conventional means. We must therefore focus on technological advances that will allow us to achieve more destruction with less. Much, much more.
translation: 我们永远不能寄希望于通过常规手段来把我们可能的敌人炸个精光。因此我们必须注重于科技进步，这使得我们能通过更少的成本造成更多的破坏。更多，多得多的破坏。

original: IAR 80
translation: IAR 80

original: Our engineers have excellent ideas that they are eager to pour into a new fighter design. They merely need funding and the go-ahead.
translation: 我们的工程师有一些优秀的想法而他们急于将其用在我们新的战斗机设计型号上。他们需要的只是资金和继续前进。

original: Army Maneuvers
translation: 军队演习

original: Our army must be brought back in shape for potential future armed conflicts. We will send them on maneuvers to develop new tactics and strategies.
translation: 我们的部队必须恢复元气以应对未来的武装冲突。我们将送他们参加演习以开发新的战术和战略。

original: Army War College
translation: 军事战争学院

original: We require the brightest minds in command of our military forces, which means the war college must be expanded.
translation: 我们需要最聪明的头脑来指挥我们的军事力量，这意味着我们的军事学院必须扩大。

original: A §Y2 Skill§! General named §YBarbu Paraianu§! will appear.
translation: 一个 §Y2级技能§! 的将军名叫 §Y巴尔布·帕拉阿努§! 将出现。

original: The ZB-53
translation: ZB-53重机枪

original: Modern equipment is key in warfare, and we must strive to modernize our infantry weaponry.
translation: 现代装备在战场上至关重要，我们必须努力现代化我们的步兵武器。

original: Vanatori De Munte
translation: 山地猎兵

original: \nGain a §YMountaineer§! unit with 9 battalions.\n
translation: \n获得一个有9个旅的 §Y山地师§! 单位。\n

original: The Vanatori De Munte - Mountain Huntsmen - are our elite mountain infantry. Their reputation precedes them, even abroad, and we would do well to bolster their numbers with the best that we can find.
translation: 山地猎兵（Vanatori De Munte）是我们的精英山地步兵部队。他们声名在外，甚至远播国外，而我们将尽我们所能找到的最好的资源来增加他们的数量。

original: Artillery Modernization
translation: 炮兵现代化

original: Infantry do not function with proper artillery support. Ensuring modern, high-quality guns will go a long way to improving the effectiveness of our forces.
translation: 步兵没有合适的火炮资源就不能作战。确保供应现代化的、高质量的炮管将极大增强我们部队的作战效率。

original: Modern AT Guns
translation: 现代反坦克炮

original: The age of the tank has arrived, and our infantry require up-to-date means to defend themselves against these steel behemoths.
translation: 坦克的时代已经到来，而我们的步兵需要最新式的手段来对抗这些钢铁庞然大物。

original: Mountain Artillery
translation: 山地火炮

original:
Enables §HMountain Gun§!
§HArtillery
    Mountain§!: Movement: §G+15%§!
§HAnti-Tank
    Mountain§!: Movement: §G+15%§!
translation:
采用 §H山地火炮§!
§H火炮
    山地§!：移动：§G+15%§!
§H反坦克炮
    山地§!：移动：§G+15%§!

original: Our mountaineers must receive the artillery support they are due, if we are to preserve their excellence. Our artillery must therefore be adapted for mountain use.
translation: 我们的山地部队必须收到应有的火炮支援，如果我们要维持他们的优势。我们的火炮必须改进适用于山地用途。

original: Reserve Divisions
translation: 预备部队

original: Romania is a small nation, and we must allocate appropriate numbers to reserve divisions if our army is to have any staying power in the field.
translation: 罗马尼亚是一个小国家，而我们必须分配适当数量的预备部队，以备我们的军队在战场上需求保留的力量做补充。

original: Royal Guards Divisions
translation: 皇家警备师

original: Gain a unit with §Y7 Infantry§! and §Y2 Artillery§! battalions.\n
translation: 获得一个有 §Y7个步兵旅§! 和 §Y2个炮兵旅§! 的单位。\n

original: Our Royal Guards must be expanded, as appropriate for our great King.
translation: 我们的皇家警备师必须扩编，与我们伟大国王的身份相匹配。

original: The Armored Division
translation: 装甲部队

original: Gain a unit with §Y4 Medium Armor§! and §Y4 Motorized§! battalions.\n
translation: 获得一个有 §Y4个中型坦克旅§! 和 §Y4各摩托化步兵旅 §! 的单位。\n

original: Tanks are the way forward, and we must establish dedicated divisions that utilize the strengths of these new weapons.
translation: 坦克是未来发展的道路，而我们必须建立专门的部队来运用这些新武器的力量。

original: Acquire Modern Tanks
translation: 获取现代坦克

original: The development of tanks continues at a rapid pace, and it will not do to acquire obsolete models.
translation: 坦克的发展一直保持着快速的节奏，而我们不会再采用过时的型号。

original: Mobile Tank Destroyers
translation: 自行坦克歼击车

original: We do not possess the industry to out-produce our enemies in terms of tanks. We must instead focus on producing weapons that can nullify the enemy's superiority in armored units.
translation: 我们不具备超过我们敌人的坦克工业生产力。因此我们选择注重于生产能够使敌方的优势装甲力量无效化的武器。

original: The Maresal
translation: “元帅”型坦克歼击车

original: Our engineers have come up with an idea to place a Soviet 122mm howitzer in an enclosed casemate. By further refining this design, we may well be on our way to create a highly-successful tank model.
translation: 我们的工程师想出了一个主意来把苏联的122mm榴弹炮放在一个封闭的底座上。通过进一步精细化这个设计，我们也许正走在创造一种高度成功的坦克型号的道路上。亦即“元帅”（Maresal）型坦克歼击车。

original: Expand the Galati Shipyards
translation: 扩建加拉茨船厂

original: Our already-existing shipyard facilities at Galati must be greatly expanded if we are to project our power into the Black Sea.
translation: 我们现有的在加拉茨的船厂必须被大规模扩建以使我们能将力量投射到黑海。

original: Coastal Defense Navy
translation: 岸防海军

original: With our limited resources, we can strive for no more than to secure our shores. All effort must be directed towards this goal.
translation: 鉴于我们的资源有限，我们尽力所能做到的只是保卫我们的海岸线安全。所有的努力必须指向这个目标。

original: Coastal Defense Ships
translation: 岸防舰艇

original:
Enables §HCoastal Defense Ships§!
§HHeavy Cruisers§!
    Armor: §G+20%§!
    Naval Firepower: §G+10%§!
    Production Cost: §G-10%§!
translation:
采用 §H岸防舰艇§!
§H重巡洋舰§!
    装甲：§G+20%§!
    对海火力：§G+10%§!
    生产消耗：§G-10%§!

original: New designs will have to be created for ships that excel at coastal defense duties.
translation: 我们将为舰船设计新的专用于海岸防卫的型号。

original: Modern Destroyers
translation: 现代驱逐舰

original: Destroyers are the backbone of any navy, and ours is no exception. Our naval backbone must be brought in line with the standards of today.
translation: 对任何一支海军来说驱逐舰都是基干支柱，对我们的海军来说也不例外。 我们海军的基干必须跟得上现今的标准。

original: Torpedo Boats
translation: 鱼雷艇

original: Torpedoes are the great equalizer of naval warfare. By ensuring all our ships carry them, we may be able to surprise and annihilate a superior force through sheer audacity and volume of torpedo fire.
translation: 鱼雷是水面战场的巨大平衡性武器。确保我们所有的船都能携带它，我们就可能通过大胆机动和大量鱼雷火力给一支远胜于我们的海军带来令人惊讶的破坏。

original: Modern Submarines
translation: 现代潜艇

original: Submarine warfare is the most exciting naval development since the invention of the torpedo boat. We would do well to not just protect against submarines, but also use them against enemy shipping.
translation: 自从发明鱼雷艇后潜艇就是海军战争中最令人赛艇的发展领域。我们将做好努力来不仅仅防御潜艇，同时也利用潜艇攻击敌方舰船。

original: Black Sea Dominance
translation: 黑海霸权

original: Our initial lack of resources should be no impediment to future total Romanian dominance of the Black Sea. With appropriate political will, we will make this a reality.
translation: 我们基础的资源缺乏不应当成为罗马尼亚统治黑海的阻碍。伴随着合适的政治意志，我们将会把黑海霸权变为现实。

original: Capital Ships
translation: 主力舰艇

original: If we are to be taken seriously as a naval power, we will require capital ships to head our Black Sea fleet.
translation: 如果我们要严肃地将自己作为一个海上强权来看待，我们就需要主力舰来引领我们的黑海舰队。

original: Torpedo Bombers
translation: 鱼雷轰炸机

original: We can make up our naval weakness by appropriating a portion of our air forces to naval duties. This will require a new airplane model that can carry a torpedo.
translation: 我们可以通过将一部分空军力量转为执行海上作战来弥补我们的海军劣势。这将需要一种能携带鱼雷的新型飞机型号。

original: Expand the Marine Regiment
translation: 扩编海军陆战队

original: Mastery of the Black Sea opens up opportunities for new avenues of attack. Naval invasions are now a viable option, requiring the creation of new models of transports, as well as dedicated marine divisions that can specialize in this form of warfare.
translation: 掌控黑海为我们新的攻击途径创造了机会。从海上入侵现在是一种可行的选择，而我们需要开发一种新的运输船型号，同时创建专门的海军陆战队部队来专门执行这种特殊作战。

original: Fortification Studies
translation: 要塞建造研究

original: The need to fortify our border is clear, but the question is how? The French have recently constructed an incredible fortified line of their own, the Maginot Line, and by sending a delegation to study their methods it should be possible to solve our own border defense problems.
translation: 强化我们边界的防御体系是极其必要的，但问题在于我们该怎么做。法国人近期已经完成了一个难以置信的要塞群的修建，即马奇诺防线。我们派出了一个军事代表团去研究他们是如何修建这样一道强大的防御体系，这样一来我们就可以解决我们自己边防问题了

original: Fallback Line
translation: 后备防线

original: If the border cannot be held, it would be well to have a second line of fortification to fall back on before any attack from the west can reach our heartland.
translation: 如果战争时期我们无法守住住我们的边界，那么在来自西方的任何攻击到达我们的心脏地带之前，第二道防线便会将他们击退

original: Sudetenland Early Fortifications
translation: 苏台德设防-开始

original: The Sudetenland, our mountainous border with Germany, is the perfect place for border fortifications. Having studied the French Maginot line, we can build a similar line of our own.
translation: 苏台德区，我们与德国的山区边界，同时也是设防的完美之地，在我们研究了法国的马奇诺防线之后，我们也可以效仿他们建立起一条我们自己的防线

original: Sudetenland Advanced Fortifications
translation: 苏台德设防-中期

original: The Sudetenland now boasts a decent defensive line, but decent is not good enough when our national survival is at stake.
translation: 苏台德现在已有了一套较为体面的防御体系，但当我们的国家的生存受到威胁时，体面的防线可就远远不够了

original: Sudetenland Final Fortifications
translation: 苏台德设防-结束

original: The Sudetenland has a strong system of fortifications, but they could still be stronger!
translation: 苏台德已经有了一系列强大的防御工事！但我们还可以让它更强大！

original: Hungarian Line
translation: 匈牙利防线

original: Hungarian irredentism is a constant threat to our nation, a system of fortifications along our mutual border will help to ensure our safety.
translation: 匈牙利的领土收复主义对我们国家来说是一个致命威胁，一个防御体系将会有助于确保我们边界的安全

original: Polish Line
translation: 波兰防线

original: Polish aggression knows no bounds, but hopefully a well-fortified border will cause them to look for an easier target.
translation: 波兰的侵略思想是没有任何界限的，希望一个防御完善的边界将会让他们去寻找另一个更容易的目标

original: Internal Redoubts
translation: 内部设防

original: Any system of fortifications may be broken. To guard against this eventuality we can construct strong points around our most important cities so that they cannot easily be seized by an enemy who breaks through our lines.
translation: 任何的防御工事都可能被突破。为了应对这种可能性，我们可以围绕我们最重要的城市建立起防御体系，让我们的核心地带不会轻易被突破了防御线的敌人占领

original: Industrial Legacy
translation: 工业遗产

original: Skoda Works was the largest arms manufacturer in Austria-Hungary, and since our independence they have branched out to become a leader in many fields of industry. Having such a high concentration of both expertise and heavy industry greatly aids all industrial endeavors.
translation: 斯柯达工厂曾是奥匈帝国里最大的武器制造商，自从我们独立以来，它已经把自己的业务拓展到许多领域并成为这些领域的领导者。如此高度集中的专业知识和重工业能力将大大有利于我们在工业方面的发展

original: Czech Industry
translation: 捷克工业发展

original: There has always been tension between the Czechs and Slovaks within our nation, not least because much of our industrial power is concentrated in the Czech provinces of Bohemia and Moravia. Nonetheless, that industrial power makes much easier to build more factories in those areas despite how it may further upset the Slovakians.
translation: 捷克人和斯洛伐克人一直存在着不满和摩擦，因为我们的大部分工业都集中在波希米亚和摩拉维亚一带。但同样的，我们在这一地带建立起更多的工厂也更加容易，只不过斯洛伐克人可能会进一步在这一地区制造起混乱

original: Industrial Heartlands
translation: 工业核心区

original: Further investment focused into Bohemia and Moravia will improve our industry far more than a broader approach.
translation: 进一步在波希米亚和摩拉维亚地区的投入对我国工业的提升远远大于在其他地区分散投入。

original: New Industry Towns
translation: 新兴工业城镇

original: After developing the old industrial areas in Bohemia and Moravia, it is now time to build new towns to house the workers for our growing industries.
translation: 在扩展了波希米亚和摩拉维亚地区的旧工业地区之后，现在是时候为经济成长吸引来的工人们建立新的房屋和城镇了。

original: Balanced Industry Investments
translation: 平衡式工业发展

original: In an effort to ease tensions between Czechs and Slovaks, it has been proposed that future industrial growth should be evenly split between their respective parts of the country despite this being less efficient overall.
translation: 为了缓解捷克人和斯洛伐克人紧张局势，有人建议我们未来的工业发展应该在各个地区之间平均分配，尽管这样做总体效率较低，但可以缓解双方的不满

original: Joint Czech-Slovakian Planning Commission
translation: 捷克-斯洛伐克联合计划委员会

original: By creating a combined body of politicians from both parts of the nation we can ensure that everyone can share equally in the industrial growth of our nation.
translation: 成立一个由国内两个部分的政客共同领导的平台，我们可以保证国内所有地区都可以得到平等的工业发展机会。

original: Local Specialisation
translation: 地区专业化

original: With the continued investment in the industry of all regions of the country, some areas have begun to specialize in certain goods and services. We can encourage this further.
translation: 在全国所有地区进行工业投资的过程中，一些地区开始针对一部分产品和服务进行专业化发展。我们应该予以激励。

original: United Population
translation: 联合民族

original: A number of recent political initiatives combined with our policy of balanced industrial growth has lead to Czechs and Slovaks nation-wide feeling much more united in purpose.
translation: 我们的最近的政治举措，结合我们的平衡的工业发展，使得捷克人和斯洛伐克人更加团结一致了

original: Arms Exports
translation: 武器出口

original: Skoda Works have long been major suppliers of arms throughout Europe, producing weapons on a scale far higher than our nation alone requires. Production on such a scale leads to efficiencies of production that few other producers can dream of.
translation: 斯柯达工厂长期以来是整个欧洲的军火主要供应商，其生产的武器规模远远高于我国军队的需求，这样的需求所造成的生产效率之高，是其他国家的工业无法想象的

original: Export Subsidies
translation: 出口补贴

original: As the threat of war looms, more and more nations are looking to purchase tanks. Government guarantees for loans and other measures can encourage other countries to buy Czechoslovakian, and improve the economies of scale even further.
translation: 随着战争的威胁扩大，越来越多的国家正在寻求购买坦克。国家为债务进行保证以及其他经济手段可以刺激其他国家来进口捷克-斯洛伐克的产品，进一步提升我们的经济水平。

original: Equal Access Guarantee
translation: 公平保障

original: Demand for weapons is at an all-time high, and so is the output of our production lines. To support weapon sales, we can publically declare that we will sell to anyone with the cash to pay for it - and then use the money to invest in our own rearmament.
translation: 现在各国对武器的需求是历史最高的，我们的生产线的产量也是如此。为了维持武器出口，我们可以公开宣布我们会给任何愿意付钱的买家提供武器——然后用这笔钱来投资我国装备的升级。

original: Political Direction
translation: 政治方向

original: Our democracy is young and has not yet been strongly tested. With both Fascism and Communism on the rise throughout Europe, the question has to be asked: Is this the right direction, or if not, what is?
translation: 民主制度对我们来说还是十分新鲜的，并没有得到很好的考验。法西斯主义和共产主义在整个欧洲崛起，我们不禁发问：这是正确的发展未来，还只是一场闹剧呢？

original: Go Left
translation: 向左走

original: Communism is the future! All efforts must be directed into reshaping our government and society to follow Marxist ideals.
translation: 共产主义是我们的未来！我们要用一切努力去重新塑造我们的政府和社会以遵循马克思主义理想

original: Czech Socialism
translation: 捷克社会主义

original: Central control is certainly great for the economy, but perhaps it is possible to have too much of a good thing. By decentralizing slightly into both Czech and Slovakian soviets, greater overall unity can prevail!
translation: 中央目前对于经济有的绝对的控制权，但有时候好事过头反成坏事。通过将经济的控制权分别分散在斯洛伐克和捷克的苏维埃，我们这一个更大的联合体将会受益匪浅！

original: Communism With a Human Face
translation: 共产主义与人的共同面

original: By calling for a greater participation of the people in local and country politics under the umbrella of the Communist Party we shall breathe new life into the ideals of Communism.
translation: 要求人民在共产党的大旗下进一步参与地方和国家政治，我们将会为了共产主义的理想奉献生命

original: Communist Support
translation: 共产主义援助

original: Our Leftward swing is gathering momentum. Support for communism is growing nationwide, and the rate will only increase as we throw more government support behind it.
translation: 我们的左倾势力正在积聚势头，对共产主义的支持正在全国范围内增长，如果要把共产主义从理想化为现实，政府的支持是必不可少的

original: Join Comintern
translation: 加入共产国际

original: Our less progressive former allies can no longer be relied on. It is time to sign an alliance with the USSR to ensure our security against Fascist-Imperialist aggression.
translation: 我们已经不能再依靠那些思想落后的旧盟友了，现在是时候与苏联正式结盟，以确保我们能共同抵御法西斯帝国主义的侵略

original: The Romanian Question
translation: 罗马尼亚问题

original: Romania stands between us and our friend and protector, the Soviet Union. Since they will not permit the passage of Soviet troops to aid in our defense, a more drastic solution must be considered.
translation: 罗马尼亚站在我们的与苏联之间，既然他们不允许苏联让苏联军队通过他们的土地以援助我们的防御，那么我们必须考虑一个更为激进的解决方案

original: The Polish Division
translation: 分裂波兰

original: Not only does Poland refuse the passage of Soviet troops in the event we need their help, they still harbor resentment over our liberation of the Zaolzie region and may well seek revenge. A preemptive defense would be prudent.
translation: 波兰不仅仅在我们需要帮助的时候拒绝了苏联军队的通行请求，还对我们的扎伊尔地区虎视眈眈，甚至有可能做出先发制人的打击。不管怎么样，抢先处理掉问题总是好的

original: Democratic Bastion
translation: 民主堡垒

original: Czechoslovakia is a bastion of democracy in Central Europe and shall remain so come what may!
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克是中欧民主的堡垒！现在是！以后也是！

original: Beacon of Liberty
translation: 自由灯塔

original: Our commitment to democracy inspires both our own citizens and those who have had to flee from more oppressive regimes.
translation: 我们对民主的承诺和保障激励了我们自己的公民和那些不得不离开更为压迫的政权的人

original: Defensive Preparations
translation: 防御性动员

original: It seems certain that war is coming whether we want it to or not. As such, it is best that we are prepared for it.
translation: 无论我们是否愿意，战争都将来临。因此，我们最好提前做好准备

original: Czech Technical University
translation: 捷克技术大学

original: With war looming, a greater focus on practical technology will stand us in good stead.
translation: 随着战争的到来，更加注重实用技术将使我们能够更好的生存下来

original: Go Right
translation: 向右走

original: Only under Fascism can the Czech people rise to greatness! Democracy in Europe is doomed to extinction, and only the strong nations, the fascist nations, will have a seat at the negotiating tables when the weak states are carved up!
translation: 只有在法西斯主义下，捷克人才能崛起！ 欧洲的民主注定要灭绝，唯有强国，唯有法西斯国家在弱国被分割时，才能在谈判桌上占据一席之地！

original: Czech Fascism
translation: 捷克法西斯主义

original: Support for Fascism is growing nationwide, and as more power falls into Fascist hands more pressure can be applied to the dissidents who resist.
translation: 对法西斯主义的支持正在全国范围内增长，随着更多的权力落在法西斯手中，我们可以用更多的手段去处理持不同政见者

original: Aggressive Wars
translation: 积极备战

original: With Fascism triumphant, our rise to power can begin!
translation: 随着法西斯控制了政府，我们可以开始我们的强权之路了！

original: The Polish Question
translation: 波兰问题

original: The Poles have never forgiven us for Zaolzie, and if we show any weakness they will undoubtedly pounce. Why should a great nation such as Czechoslovakia suffer under this kind of threat? No More! Decisive action must be taken!
translation: 波兰从来没有放弃过夺回扎尔奥的行为，如果我们表现出一丝弱势，他们势必将会扑向我们。但为什么一个伟大的国家，如捷克斯洛伐克会处于这种威胁之下呢？现在不会了！我们将会立刻采取果断的行动！

original: Czech Consolidation
translation: 捷克优先

original: From the day our country was formed, the Slovaks have been discontent. Always seeking more political power, always demanding more than their fair share of national resources. No more! Henceforth, power will be concentrated in Czech hands. §RThis will lead to civil war.§!
translation: 从我们国家成立的那一天起，斯洛伐克人就充满不满，他们总是寻求更多的政治权力，总是要求更多的国家资源。这一切都到此为止了！以后！权力将集中在捷克手中！§R这将导致内战爆发§!

original: National Fascism
translation: 国家法西斯主义

original: Czechs and Slovaks alike are fully united under the banner of Fascism. Together, we march forward! Together we are unstoppable!
translation: 捷克人和斯洛伐克人将在法西斯主义的旗帜下团结一致。我们一起前进！ 我们的团结是不可阻挡的！

original: German Ally
translation: 德国的侍从

original: Germany is a rising power, a power which we can follow to glory. Where Germany leads, we shall follow and gather our objectives on the way.
translation: 德国是一个崛起的力量，我们可以追求德国人那份荣耀的力量。德国将会引领我们，而我们将在路上跟随德国的脚步并完成我们的目标

original: Become a German Satellite, giving bonuses to licensing German technology but also giving Germany overlordship over our country.
translation: 成为德国的卫星国，同时德国也会给予我们技术许可的奖励，但德国也会成为我们国家的控制者

original: German Partner
translation: 德国的伙伴

original: Germany is a fellow Fascist power, a fellow traveler on the road to glory. Together we will make the world rotate around the Prague-Berlin Axis!
translation: 德国是法西斯主义的中坚力量，是我们荣耀之路的同行之一 ，我们的联盟将会让世界围绕布拉格 - 柏林轴心旋转！

original: Strategic Decisions
translation: 战略决策

original: A storm is gathering over Europe, the threat of war looms, but how shall Czechoslovakia meet the challenges ahead?
translation: 风暴即将降临在欧罗巴，那便是战争的威胁，但捷克斯洛伐克将如何迎接未来的挑战？

original: German Appeasement
translation: 绥靖德国

original: German power is on the rise, and their stated goal is to unite all German-speaking people within one Reich. As a nation with a sizable German minority, these are worrying developments. Unless we can secure powerful allies of our own we may benefit from staying in Germany's good graces.
translation: 德国正在重新回到世界强权的行列，他们的目标是将所有的德语人口团结在他们的帝国下。我们作为一个有相当数量的德裔民族的国家，面对这令人担忧的现实或许我们应该做出一些让步。除非我们有能够保障自己的强大盟友，否则我们可能不得不向德国屈服

original: German Puppet
translation: 德国傀儡

original: Germany cannot be appeased, they will not stop until they rule over us. And yet, perhaps by bending the knee we can preserve some autonomy?
translation: 德国没办法被安抚，除非他们彻底统治我们。然而或许我们可以放开我们的膝盖，向他们祈求一点自主权？

original: The Hungarian Situation
translation: 匈牙利局势

original: Hungary has long been a thorn in our side, but with the full power of Fascism behind us the time of Hungary has come to an end.
translation: 匈牙利一直是我们背后的一根倒刺，但随着法西斯主义让我们认识到了自身的强大，匈牙利的时代也即将结束

original: Deliver Sudetenland
translation: 交出苏台德区

original: Germany wants our Germans. It seems that if we want to avert war the only way is to hand over the Sudetenland.
translation: 德国想要的就是我们的德语人口，如果我们想要避免战争，唯一的办法就是交出苏台德区

original: German Technology
translation: 德国技术

original: With peaceful relations between our nations now assured, it has been suggested that mutual exchange of technology could benefit both sides.
translation: 现在我们国家之间的和平得到保证，有人建议相互交流技术可以使双方受益

original: Trust In the West
translation: 信任西方

original: France and Britain will protect the peace in Europe. After all, they didn't win the Great War just to let Germany threaten and dismember sovereign nations twenty years later!
translation: 法国和英国将保护欧洲的和平。毕竟，是他们赢得了上一次大战，即使是二十年后他们也会为了世界和平再一次击倒德国！

original: Doctrinal Innovation
translation: 军事理论创新

original: We have learned much from officer exchanges and strategy sessions with our allies. Combining such disparate points of view has put us on the edge of a breakthrough.
translation: 我们从军官交流会和战略研讨会议上从我们的盟友那学到了很多东西。结合不同的观点可以让我们的军事理论得到新的突破

original: Knowledge Sharing Teams
translation: 知识共享团队

original: Allied knowledge sharing has brought such large benefits that it has now been proposed as a permanent institution.
translation: 一同进行知识和技术共享给我们带来了如此巨大的好处，现在我们为此建立起了一个常驻机构

original: Secret Weapons
translation: 秘密武器

original: The future of Czech warfare lies in mastering multiple advanced technologies and using them to our best advantage.
translation: 如果捷克要赢得未来的战争，那么势必要掌握多种先进技术，并将其用于最大的优势

original: Nuclear Weapons
translation: 核武器

original: The future of Czech warfare lies in mastering the power of the split atom!
translation: 捷克的未来在于掌握分裂原子的力量！

original: An Entente of Our Own
translation: 属于我们的协约国

original: The 'Little Entente' has lapsed in recent years, but it could yet rise again if our former allies are willing.
translation: 虽然这几年来小协约国已经支离破碎，但如果我们盟友愿意的话，我们可以再一次重建小协约国

original: Invite Yugoslavia
translation: 邀请南斯拉夫

original: Invite Yugoslavia to the Entente.
translation: 邀请南斯拉夫加入协约

original: Invite Romania
translation: 邀请罗马尼亚

original: Invite Romania to the Entente.
translation: 邀请罗马尼亚加入协约

original: The Pact of Organization
translation: 联合协定

original: In order to work well together, the armies of the Entente should be equipped to a similar level. To achieve this, we propose that all members of our faction should freely share their technology with each other.
translation: 为了一起作战，我们军队应该有统一的高级指挥部。要实现这一点，我们建议协约国的所有成员应该从互相自由分享情报开始共享信息

original: Security Council
translation: 安全理事会

original: The Entente security council will ensure that all members are coordinated when joint military operations are planned.
translation: 组织安全委员会将确保在联合军事行动计划时所有成员国军队协调一致

original: Dissolve Hungary
translation: 肢解匈牙利

original: As peace breaks down throughout Europe, the Entente cannot allow Hungary to become a threat again. Only a permanent solution can allow us to focus on the larger issues at hand.
translation: 和平开始在欧洲遭到威胁，我们的盟友要求我们不能让匈牙利再一次成为我们的威胁，只有永久性的解决方案才可以彻底的解决匈牙利并让我们转到于手头上更严重的麻烦

original: Dissolve Bulgaria
translation: 肢解保加利亚

original: Bulgaria has re-armed and again threatens the security of the Balkans. This is a threat that cannot be tolerated if the Entente is to focus on a general conflict in Europe.
translation: 保加利亚已经重新武装起来并这一次威胁到了巴尔干地区的安全，这是一份不可容忍的威胁，如果协约国要专注于欧洲的冲突那么保加利亚必须要被消灭

original: Rapprochement With Hungary
translation: 与匈牙利和解

original: Hungarian irredentism is a constant threat, but perhaps one last effort can be made to settle the issue peacefully?
translation: 匈牙利的领土收复主义是一个严重的威胁，但也许一个努力可以和平解决这个问题？

original: Czechoslovak Legion
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克军团

original: The Czechoslovak Legion fought all over Europe during the Great war, and deep within Russia during their civil war. Now, as conflict spreads throughout Europe the Legion may march once again.
translation: 捷克斯洛伐克军团在上一次大战期间在欧洲各地进行了作战，甚至在俄罗斯内战期间也活跃着。 现在，随着整个欧洲的冲突蔓延，军团将会再次回归

original: Military Technical Institute
translation: 军事技术学院

original: The Military Technical Institute exists to provide the Czechoslovak armed forces with military research, development, and testing capabilities.
translation: 军事技术学院的存在是为捷克斯洛伐克武装部队提供军事研究，武器开发和测试

original: Mountain Troops
translation: 山地部队

original: When so much of our border consists of hills and mountains, the need for specialized soldiers to police and defend those areas is clear.
translation: 当我们这边边界大部分由山丘组成时，我们需要专门的士兵来警察和守卫这些地区

original: Infantry Advancement
translation: 步兵武器改良

original: Infantry is the most important unit in our army, so improving their weapons is a vital step towards successful national defense.
translation: 步兵是我军最重要的单位，改善他们的武器是国防计划最重要的一步

original: Support Units
translation: 支援单位

original: In order for our infantry to perform at peak efficiency, the supporting branches must also be modernized.
translation: 为了让我们的步兵以最高的效率进行作战，我们的支援单位也必须现代化

original: Artillery Advancement
translation: 火炮改进

original: Queen of the battlefield, modern artillery will be a large force-multiplier in our army.
translation: 作为战场王后的现代化火炮将会大批量装备在我们的军队里

original: Doctrine Discoveries
translation: 战术研究

original: Weapons alone do not make an army potent, effective doctrines are also required. The Military Technical Institute is well aware of this and has offered several suggestions.
translation: 只有武器不能使军队有战斗力，成功的战术也是必需品。军事技术研究所深知这一点，并向我们的军方高层提出了建议

original: Motorization Scheme
translation: 机动化计划

original: While we do not have the largest army around, motorization offers the possibility of concentrating our forces more rapidly in an area.
translation: 虽然我们没有一支大型军队可供随时调用，但一支机动化的军队可以为我们提供在一个地区更加灵活调动的能力

original: The LT vz. 38
translation: LT-38

original: Our army boasts some of the most advanced tanks in the world, but technology in this field is rapidly advancing and we cannot afford to be left behind.
translation: 我们的军队拥有世界上最先进的坦克，但这一领域的技术正在迅速发展，我们不能被落在后面

original: Mechanization
translation: 机械化发展

original: While motorization offered our soldiers speed, mechanization offers them speed, protection, and firepower.
translation: 虽然摩托化给我们的步兵提供了速度，但机械化将会给他们提供更好的速度，保护以及更强大的火力

original: Armor Modernization
translation: 装甲部队现代化

original: The Military Technical Institute continues to work closely with Skoda Works to design new and better tanks.
translation: 军事技术学院将继续与斯柯达公司紧密合作，设计出新的更好的坦克

original: Doctrine Discoveries II
translation: 战术研究II
